targets.query:
SELECT
    concat('AS', toString(tupleElement(edge, 1)), ' -> AS', toString(tupleElement(edge, 2))) as connection,
    toString(tupleElement(edge, 1)) as source_asn,
    toString(tupleElement(edge, 2)) as target_asn,
    count() as update_count
FROM (
     SELECT arrayJoin(arrayZip(arraySlice(path, 1, -1), arraySlice(path, 2))) as edge
     FROM bgp_events
     WHERE timestamp >= $__fromTime AND timestamp <= $__toTime
     AND length(path) >= 2
)
GROUP BY source_asn, target_asn
ORDER BY update_count DESC
LIMIT 100
